author: Good Enough
description:
In the early hours of 1979, a major facility near a quiet Pennsylvania town experienced a serious malfunction. What followed changed how the world views energy safety and emergency response. This incident was the moment that reshaped public trust and industry standards.

#ThreeMileIsland #Shorts #History #EnergyCrisis #TrueStory #RealEvents #ScienceHistory
title: The Three Mile Island Nuclear Accident 💥 😰 #nuclearaccident #nuclearhistory #truestory #nuclear
